Message:
My master was someone
that always complimented me.

She took me in after
I had been abandoned,
and gave me a new name.

Everything I know about magic,
I learned from her—a beautiful,
kind witch, who baked the best
pumpkin pies.

When I gifted her flowers
I had bloomed with my
magic for the first time,
she complimented me with
the brightest smile on her face.

I was so flattered,
it made me want to
practice even harder.
